verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> in many <S%G4183>things<s%> we <S%G4417>offend<s%> <S%G537>all.<s%> If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G4417>offend<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> is a <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> and <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G5468>bridle<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G5469>bits<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2462>horses'<s%> <S%G4750>mouths,<s%> that <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G2254>us;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we turn <S%G3329>about<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ships,<s%> which though they <S%G5607>be<s%> so <S%G5082>great,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1643>driven<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G4642>fierce<s%> <S%G417>winds,<s%> yet are they turned <S%G3329>about<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> a very <S%G1646>small<s%> <S%G4079>helm,<s%> <S%G3699>whithersoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3730>governor<s%> <S%G2116><s%> <S%G1014>listeth.<s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3196>member,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> boasteth great <S%G3166>things.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> how <S%G2245>great<s%> a <S%G5208>matter<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G381>kindleth!<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> is a <S%G4442>fire,<s%> a <S%G2889>world<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2525>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3196>members,<s%> that it <S%G4695>defileth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> setteth on <S%G5394>fire<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5164>course<s%> of <S%G1078>nature;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it is set on <S%G5394>fire<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G1067>hell.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5449>kind<s%> of <S%G2342>beasts,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4071>birds,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of <S%G2062>serpents,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of things in the <S%G1724>sea,<s%> is <S%G1150>tamed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hath been <S%G1150>tamed<s%> of <S%G442>mankind:<s%> <S%G5449><s%>

Therewith <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2127>bless<s%> we <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>therewith<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2672>curse<s%> we <S%G444>men,<s%> which are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3669>similitude<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410>Can<s%> the fig <S%G4808>tree,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G4160>bear<s%> olive <S%G1636>berries?<s%> <S%G2228>either<s%> a <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G4810>figs?<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> can <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G4077>fountain<s%> both <S%G4160>yield<s%> <S%G252>salt<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1099>fresh.<s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> is a wise <S%G4680>man<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> endued with <S%G1990>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you?<s%> let him <S%G1166>show<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4240>meekness<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> that is from <S%G509>above<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G53>pure,<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G1516>peaceable,<s%> <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> and easy to be <S%G2138>entreated,<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruits,<s%> without <S%G87>partiality,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G505>hypocrisy.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> of <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1515>peace.<s%>
